actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to permit any returned prisoner of war of the Vietnam conflict to import free of duty additional personal and household effects during the 1-year period after his return to the jurisdiction of the United States.

summary.text: Permits any returned prisoner of war of the Vietnam conflict to import free of duty additional personal and household effects during the one-year period after his return to the jurisdiction of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to permit any returned prisoner of war of the Vietnam conflict to import free of duty additional personal and household effects during the 1-year period after his return to the jurisdiction of the United States.
